sentences.sContent: Japan was the first Asian country to modernize on its own terms, outside of colonial or semi-colonial control, or even, after 1895, extraterritoriality.
sentences.sContent_eng: Japan was the first Asian country to modernize on its own terms, outside of colonial or semi-colonial control, or even, after 1895, extraterritoriality.
sentences.sCn: 日本是亚洲第一个现代化的国家就其本身来说，远离殖民地或半殖民地的控制之苦，甚至，1895年以后，治外法权。

trans.tranCn: 治外法权； 不受管辖
